title: Devils Postpile National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Devils Postpile National Monument Founders’ Day Weekend Night Sky Program      Time: 8:30 PM Location: Minaret Vista Overlook     Friday, August 26, 2016 Continue the National Park Service Centennial celebration of Founders' Day weekend for an hour long evening program with rangers at Minaret Vista, an excellent location for exploring the night skies! View Details      Devils Postpile National Monument Stewardship Day/Founders’ Celebration      Location: Devils Postpile Ranger Station     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join the celebration of the National Park Service's 100th birthday on Founders' Day, Saturday, August 27th, with a day of stewardship activities, including restoration and improvement projects.
